name: Mini Golf in Space
description:
Controls:

A- Aim left

D- Aim Right

Space - Increase ball hit strength

Right click (on ball) - Hit the ball

Objective:

Get to the hole in as few shots as possible

Potential issues:

If the ball goes behind an object, and can't be seen, unfortunately you'll have to reset as I didn't get around to fixing that (sorry)

When you reset the balls power, the power will reset but not the visual of the arrow
